text: Manoj Nelliyattu Shyamalan (; മനോജ്‌ നെല്ലിയാട്ടു ശ്യാമളന്‍, Mitur Ben Es- Derti ,Latin English: Maṉōj Nelliyāṯṯu Ṣiyāmaḷaṉ, born 6 August 1970), known professionally as M. Night Shyamalan, is an American filmmaker and screenwriter who resides and works primarily in the United States. He is known for making movies with contemporary supernatural plots that climax with a twist ending. Some of his notable movies are The Sixth Sense (1999), Unbreakable (2000), Signs (2002), The Village (2004), Lady in the Water (2006), The Happening (2008) and The Last Airbender (2010). He is also known for filming his movies (and staging his plots) in and around Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, where he was raised. ==Early Life== Shyamalan was born in a Hindu household in Mahé, Puducherry, India.Bamberger, Michael. The Man Who Heard Voices: Or, How M. Night Shyamalan Risked His Career on a Fairy Tale (Gotham Books, New York, 2006), p. 150. His father, Nelliate C. Shyamalan is a Malayali traditional physician (Vaidyar) from Mahé. His mother, Jayalakshmi is Tamil and is an obstetrician and gynecologist by profession. ==Movies== Year Film Director Producer Writer Actor Role Notes 1992 Praying with Anger Dev Raman 1998 Wide Awake 1999 The Sixth Sense Dr. Hill 1999 Stuart Little 2000 Unbreakable Stadium drug dealer 2002 Signs Ray Reddy 2002 The Four Feathers 2004 The Village Jay (Guard at desk) 2006 Lady in the Water Vick Ran/The Vessel 2008 The Happening Joey Voice 2010 The Last Airbender Firebender at Earth Prison Camp 2010 Devil Only credited for story concept; not screenplay 2013 After Earth 2015 The Visit ===Other projects=== *Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull *Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone ==Other websites== * *M.
